page.title: 16Shopping Facilities
page.content: There are no shops within the designated area, following the recent closure of the Farm Shop at Fountain Farm, between the Kilnwick crossroads and Watton. This shop had provided a range of fruit and vegetables and other farm produce, plus a variety of farm-related goods such as woollen jumpers and rugs. The nearest shop is to be found at Kilnwick, although most people tend to use the shops at Hutton Cranswick for immediate requirements and those at Driffield or Beverley for major items or large-scale shopping. Beswick still retains a sub-post office, but this only operates on a part-time basis. For all other facilities a journey beyond the confines of the designated area is necessary.
